alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Upper Jefferson (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 4:55PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL ST. CHARLES AND NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON PARISHES THROUGH 530 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Rose, or near Metairie, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Metairie, Jefferson, Harahan, River Ridge, St. Rose, Elmwood, Ama, Destrehan, Waggaman, and New Orleans Armstrong Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 215 and 227. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
